content.description: The following question is based on a chord progression that includes a secondary harmonic function.
content.question: The chord progression begins with I to I6 and ends with a Ⅰ64 – Ⅴ7 – Ⅰ. Chords 3 and 4 are a secondary (applied) dominant and its resolution, best analyzed as

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
